Still, from (0,7), I can go RIGHT to (1,7) only if opponent leaves, but it's a body collision risk if their body grows there later.  

**Aggressive Play:** Since scores are tied (0-0), forcing a head-on collision isn't smart yet - I need to grow first. But I can't let opponent get ahead.
